input.sentences: our wood shop class held a demonstration in the gymnasium .
we showed our skills off to everyone who attended .
people even offered to buy our furniture .
no one offered to buy this ugly bird house .
here 's our teacher in action . he can make anything out of wood .
output.sentences: When I was in school, I took wood shop
We worked on a lot of projects and learned a lot of skills.
Some of us decided to make furniture with some donated items.
Not all of our projects were successful.
The teacher stepped in and helped when we were having trouble.
